name: Detective Rewind
description:
-READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING-

This game is played by turning on the computer by clicking on the keyboard. Then you want to click on the button that is on the monitor. This will show you the footage that you have to go back and forth through. You have to click on ONLY the items that have gone missing in the footage.  This will initiate the end of the game and you can keep replaying for however long you want. (:

Detective Rewind is on the case! Play as this detective as he's analyzing some footage of a robbery at his own station! This attacker has sabotaged the footage and edited themselves out of it. Help out with discovering what was stolen is this robbery!

If you are playing this game and you like it, would you be willing to rate my game in the Brackeys 2020.2 game jam? It would mean a lot to me! Thank you.

-Controls-

- Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move Backwards and Forwards in Time.

- Space to Pause and Unpause Time.

-Credit-

The office assets you see in this game are the amazing assets made by Asset Store Originals on the Unity Asset Store! https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/snaps-prototype-office-137490

The coding that makes this game work was made by ZachCreates. 

The sound effects that you hear throughout the game were made by ZachCreates.
